amendment.description: To provide $2 billion for education block grants to states to be allocated to local educational agencies for any of the purposes of the No Child Left Behind Act, Individuals with Disabilities Education Act, or Vocational Education Programs by reducing spending on other government programs by a commensurate amount.

vote.text: Amendment SA 414 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
